name: From the Dark (SamurIDev)
description:
From the dark emerges a cursed game, and a cursed enemy....

INFO: An Atari styled horror game where sound is key. Levels are randomly generated. Sometimes keys will spawn inside walls on later levels.

STORY:

 December 17, 198X, you purchase a game from a sketchy game shop. Something seems off about the game...

WASD to move.  Space to skip the intro. Collect all of the keys and get to  the door to advance. There are 5 levels. The closer the enemy gets, the louder the ambience.

Contains an original soundtrack.
